metadata.title: CVE-2020-0466 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In do_epoll_ctl and ep_loop_check_proc of eventpoll.c, there is a possibleuse after free due to a logic error. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-147802478References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-121-generic - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-4.15.0-121-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-4.15.0-121-lowlatency - 4.15.0-121.123
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-121-generic - 4.15.0-121.123

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-121.123').
